title: Beyonc√© Debuts COWBOY CARTER Live with Spectacular Hometown Halftime Concert
description: The performance marked the pop icon's first live appearance in support of her excellent album Cowboy Carter. Beyonc√© Debuts COWBOY CARTER Live with Spectacular Hometown Halftime Concert Jonah Krueger
author: Jonah Krueger
excerpt: Beyonc√© headlined the NFL Christmas game between the Baltimore Ravens and Houston Texans, marking the first live performance of COWBOY CARTER. Watch the replay here.
text: Earlier this year, Beyonc√© embraced her country side for her new album COWBOY CARTER, the follow-up to Renaissance¬†and one of the best projects of 2024. As a victory lap, the pop icon stopped by the Christmas Day matchup between the Baltimore Ravens and the Houston Texans for a commanding halftime show performance, where she performed the Cowboy Carter songs live for the first time. Streamed live on Netflix, the event went down at the NRG Stadium in the singer‚Äôs hometown of Houston, Texas. The performance began with Beyonc√© entering the stadium on a white mustang similar to the one featured on the cover to COWOY CARTER as she performed ‚Äú16 CARRIAGES.‚Äù What followed was a highly choreographed set featuring a marching band, backing dancers, and guest appearances from several of the collaborators featured on COWBOY CARTER, including Shaboozey, Post Malone, Tiera Kennedy, Tanner Adell, Brittney Spencer, and Reyna Roberts. The setlist pulled exclusively from Cowboy Carter, including Beyonc√©‚Äôs covers of The Beatles‚Äô ‚ÄúBlackbird‚Äù and Dolly Parton‚Äôs ‚ÄúJolene,‚Äù along with ‚ÄúYA YA,‚Äù ‚ÄúMY HOUSE,‚Äù her Post Malone collaboration ‚ÄúLEVII‚ÄôS JEANS,‚Äù and ‚ÄúTEXAS HOLD ‚ÄòEM,‚Äù which served as the set‚Äôs closer. Immediately following the performance, Beyonc√© teased a January 14th, 2025 announcement. COWBOY CARTER¬†just racked up a whopping 11 Grammy nominations (officially making Beyonc√© the most nominated artist in Grammy history). It also served as her latest football-related concert, as she headlined the 2013 Super Bowl Halftime Show and made an appearance during Coldplay‚Äôs Super Bowl Halftime show in 2016. Looking ahead, Kendrick Lamar is set to take charge of the halftime show for Super Bowl LIX, which will go down on Sunday, February 9th. Stream Beyonc√©‚Äôs Cowboy Carter, Kendrick Lamar‚Äôs surprise new album GNX, and more in Ultra HD via Amazon Music Unlimited. html:
Earlier this year, Beyonc√© embraced her country side for her new album COWBOY CARTER, the follow-up to Renaissance¬†and one of the best projects of 2024. As a victory lap, the pop icon stopped by the Christmas Day matchup between the Baltimore Ravens and the Houston Texans for a commanding halftime show performance, where she performed the Cowboy Carter songs live for the first time.

Streamed live on Netflix, the event went down at the NRG Stadium in the singer‚Äôs hometown of Houston, Texas. The performance began with Beyonc√© entering the stadium on a white mustang similar to the one featured on the cover to COWOY CARTER as she performed ‚Äú16 CARRIAGES.‚Äù What followed was a highly choreographed set featuring a marching band, backing dancers, and guest appearances from several of the collaborators featured on COWBOY CARTER, including Shaboozey, Post Malone, Tiera Kennedy, Tanner Adell, Brittney Spencer, and Reyna Roberts.

The setlist pulled exclusively from Cowboy Carter, including Beyonc√©‚Äôs covers of The Beatles‚Äô ‚ÄúBlackbird‚Äù and Dolly Parton‚Äôs ‚ÄúJolene,‚Äù along with ‚ÄúYA YA,‚Äù ‚ÄúMY HOUSE,‚Äù her Post Malone collaboration ‚ÄúLEVII‚ÄôS JEANS,‚Äù and ‚ÄúTEXAS HOLD ‚ÄòEM,‚Äù which served as the set‚Äôs closer.

Immediately following the performance, Beyonc√© teased a January 14th, 2025 announcement.

COWBOY CARTER¬†just racked up a whopping 11 Grammy nominations (officially making Beyonc√© the most nominated artist in Grammy history). It also served as her latest football-related concert, as she headlined the 2013 Super Bowl Halftime Show and made an appearance during Coldplay‚Äôs Super Bowl Halftime show in 2016.

Looking ahead, Kendrick Lamar is set to take charge of the halftime show for Super Bowl LIX, which will go down on Sunday, February 9th.

Stream Beyonc√©‚Äôs Cowboy Carter, Kendrick Lamar‚Äôs surprise new album GNX, and more in Ultra HD via Amazon Music Unlimited. Sign up for a three-month free trial here.
